title: KnockBackFFA
description: The only open-source KnockBackFFA Plugin that is currently actively maintained
content:
KnockBackFFA is my flagship Minecraft plugin that implements a popular minigame where players try to knock each other off platforms using knockback effects. I built it as a fully-featured solution with modern Kotlin code.

Features
  • Custom arenas and kits
  • Configurable kit settings via GUI
  • Scoreboard and Bossbar support
  • Clean, maintainable codebase

Challenges
  • Ensuring fair gameplay mechanics
  • Optimizing for server performance
  • Supporting different Minecraft versions

⬇️ Download on BuiltByBit

title: TypeWriter
description: Major contributor to an advanced player interactions plugin called TypeWriter for minecraft servers.
content:
TypeWriter is an open-source player interactions plugin based in a web editor for Minecraft servers that I contribute to as the primary documentation maintainer.

Key Contributions
  • Rewrote documentation twice to improve clarity and user experience
  • Developed advanced features including EntrySearch, Video Player integration, and Difficulty indicators
  • Implemented version compatibility tracking system

Impact
  • Enhanced documentation navigation and searchability
  • Created accessible learning resources for users of all skill levels

I continue to actively maintain the documentation as the project evolves.
⬇️ Download on Modrinth

title: MobWaves
description: A mobwaves plugin for Minecraft servers
content:
MobWaves is a PaperMC plugin I developed that creates wave-based mob attacks for Minecraft servers. This plugin adds an exciting survival challenge where players must defend against increasingly difficult waves of monsters.

Features
  • Configurable wave difficulty progression
  • Custom mob types and attributes
  • Special boss waves
  • Player rewards system
  • Area-bound wave spawning

title: Tournament
description: A commissioned tournament management plugin for RepublicMC Minecraft server
content:
Tournament is a custom-built Minecraft plugin I developed as a commissioned project for RepublicMC, a Minecraft server. Written entirely in Kotlin, this plugin provides tournament management capabilities tailored to their specific requirements.

Features
  • Custom tournament management system
  • Seamless integration with RepublicMC's server environment
  • Modern Kotlin implementation for maintainability
  • Complete administrative controls
  • Player participation tracking

Technical Aspects
  • Built with 100% Kotlin
  • Clean, maintainable codebase
  • Optimized for server performance
  • Client-specific feature implementation

title: MLib
description: A Marten_mrfcyt Kotlin PaperMC Plugin Library
content:
MLib is my personal library for Minecraft plugin development that streamlines the creation of PaperMC plugins using Kotlin. I developed this library to abstract common functionality and provide a consistent foundation for all my plugin projects.

Features
  • Command framework with argument parsing
  • Configuration management utilities
  • GUI menu creation API
  • Common utility functions like messaging
